PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-06842024-06-12GAC
ActSpecial Economic Measures Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Russia) Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (RUSSIA) REGULATIONS in order to add eleven (11) individuals and one sixteen (16) entities to Schedule 1 of the Regulations; prohibiting them from transacting business with individuals and businesses in Canada, and freezing their assets unless otherwise authorized by the Minister of the Foreign Affairs.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0130 Publication Date: 2024-07-03
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (RUSSIA) REGULATIONS in order to add eleven (11) individuals and one sixteen (16) entities to Schedule 1 of the Regulations; prohibiting them from transacting business with individuals and businesses in Canada, and freezing their assets unless otherwise authorized by the Minister of the Foreign Affairs.
